enrichment._depth_quick: Basic profile only (name, title, LinkedIn, company) — ~10 sec
enrichment._depth_standard: Above + social profiles + recent activity — ~30 sec (default)
enrichment._depth_deep: Above + news mentions + talking points + shared connections — ~60 sec

linkedin._note: Public profile search only, respects robots.txt

github._note: Great for technical leads — repos, commits, README

company_website._note: Scrapes team directories, bios, company info

crunchbase._note: Company funding, size, industry (no API key needed for basics)

premium_sources._note: Optional paid services — add API keys to ~/.clawdbot/secrets.env

clearbit._benefit: Enhanced company data, logo, social profiles

email._note: Pattern-based guessing. Add Hunter.io for verification.

output._also_output_markdown_note: Generate .md file alongside .json for quick review

talking_points._note: Requires Claude. Falls back to rule-based if not available.

job_change_detection._note: Check if they recently changed roles (high-value signal)

company_news_signals._note: Identify timing opportunities (just raised money, hiring, etc.)

shared_connections._note: Future: check mutual connections via agent networks

interest_extraction._note: Extract topics they care about for personalization

privacy._rate_limit_note: 2-second delay between requests to same domain
privacy._linkedin_note: Use public search only, no profile scraping
privacy._retention_note: Cache expires after 30 days, then re-enriches
privacy._source_urls_note: Transparency — show where data came from

batch._parallel_note: Process 3 leads concurrently (balance speed vs rate limits)
batch._progress_note: Checkpoint every 10 leads so you can resume if interrupted
batch._csv_columns: Expected columns: name, company, email, linkedin_url (min: name OR email)

trawl._note: Auto-enrich leads that reach QUALIFIED state in trawl

crm._note: POST enriched leads to your CRM after processing

linkedin_chrome_extension._note: Future: enrich from browser while viewing LinkedIn profile

real_time_alerts._note: Future: alert when a cached lead has new activity
